item.title: :bulb: shurp2018
item.description: What is it about? Some of my recent work includes writing the shurp2018-package. This R package contains all the functions used to produce descriptive reports for a study called SHURP2018 - a research project at the Institute of Nursing Science. More information is found here: https://shurp.unibas.ch more information will follow

Endnote is the citation manager proclaimed in many courses at the INS. Over the past years Iâ€™ve encountered a number of struggles personally or through my peers.

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Catherine Blatter and I am trained as a registered general nurse (RN) located in Switzerland. Iâ€™m currently finishing my Masterâ€™s degree and working as a research assistant at the Institute of Nursing Science (INS) at the University of Basel. ğŸ¥ My clinical interests and expertise lie primarily in adult acute-care surgical nursing, more specifically general, thoracic and neurosurgery in a tertiary center ğŸ‘´ ğŸ‘µ I also enjoyed working in a more rural regional hospital with mostly older & chronically ill patients - in particular because â€œchoosing wiselyâ€ was very popular and discussed often with patients and family members.
